profile.greeting: Welcome to Talk to Me center {{user_first_name}}! We are so excited to chat with you!

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Do you know that today will go and never comes back? Every {{userGender}} should make the most of it!
get_started.guidance: One positive though a day can change it to a better and a more productive day!
get_started.help: You can navigate back to the main menu by typing(hi). What we can do to make your day a better day?

care.prompt: To connect you with the right team please let me know what this is about?
care.default: Hi Khaled, we are here for you all the time. Please let us know how we can help you and we will get back to you ASAP.
care.style: Hi Khaled, we are here for you all the time. Please let us know how we can help you and we will get back to you ASAP.
care.end: I am so happy to assist you today. Together we will make the world a better place!
care.adviceR: Hi {{userFirstName}}, we are here for you all the time. Please let us know how we can help you and we will get back to you ASAP.
care.donationsR: Hi {{userFirstName}}, we are here for you all the time. Please let us know how we can help you and we will get back to you ASAP.
care.innerR: Hi {{userFirstName}}, we are here for you all the time. Please let us know how we can help you and we will get back to you ASAP.

survey.prompt: First, how do you feel today?
survey.positive: Great, being positive and happy is awesome! Please write #Question followed by your question and we will get back to you shortly
survey.negative: Why are you sad? The world is so beautiful and wants you to be happy. Please write #Question followed by your question and we will get back to you shortly
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"
survey.neutral: Sometimes we might face some challenges, but these make us more stronger in the future. Please write #Question followed by your question and we will get back to you shortly. Please do not forget to add (#) before the question.
survey.question: We recieved your question. We will get back to you shortly. You are very important to us! If you want to add more, please add (*) before you write.
survey.chat: We recieved your messege. One moment please! Please make sure to add (*) before all your communication with our representatives.

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting our website, be sure to visit us everyday to get some positives.

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over

story.prompt: Are you looking for general positive energy stories or something specific?
story.category: Great! Let's get started. First, what is the main category you are looking for?
story.mood: First, How do you feel today?
story.title: Short Story
story.subtitle: Filled with positives!
